title: FT Rare backs Lenox, Broadleaf, Red Hindu and Blank backs
author: Eddiez

posts.post_title: FT Rare backs Lenox, Broadleaf, Red Hindu and Blank backs
posts.post_content: No longer available, made 2 trades and keeping the rest.  Thanks everyone. Eddie  I would like to trade some of these cards for lower grade Hofers 1's and 2's are find if they look decent. Mainly interested in Cobbs, Wojo's, Youngs and Matty's right now. Will only trade 2 to 3 of these then pull the rest down willing to trade up or down with some cash. Broadleaf is now pending trade everything else is still there. Thanks Eddie
I’m interested in the blank backs. I have this nice PSA 1 Matty I could trade. If interested, shoot me a private message..

Damn, nice looking Matty 1, Sonny!

Good luck with trade fellas, seems like a good fit.
